name: fast-ttl-cache
description: ttl cache with capacity support use no timer

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist/ && tsup src/ --format cjs,esm && tsc src/*.ts --declarationDir dist/ --esModuleInterop true --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build

author: linye<llxy8687@foxmail.com>
